name: AntAgonist (itch)
description:
You're an ant and you gotta steal from the man at the park, take the food from his backpack that is rightfully yours.

Yes, the theme was pack.

For our first game jam, I want to formally apologise for the unpolished, buggy mess that AntAgonist is.

It is kinda funny though :)

------------

CONTROLS (for those who need instructions):

WASD or arrow keys to move, SPACE to jump.

You can walk sideways on some surfaces.

 When on a wall, WASD moves you on one plane of axis, like up and down and left and right, Not backwards and forwards.

-----------

Enjoy

~The Handsome Aussie Boys

All assets used are royalty free or created by ourselves.
